name: GameSandwich
description:
GameSandwich is a game I'm creating to teach myself how to make games.
The game showcases my progress in learning how to develop, with each level I learn to do more, which is evident in the gameplay. 
It's a mashup of different genres tied together with a score. 
only levels 1-5 are available at the moment, but I'm working on the game pretty much constantly, so new levels should be available soon.
